history.proof: unfold lb_meet, lb_join, lb_mask_equiv in *. qsimpl use: lb_meet_assoc. qsimpl use: lb_meet_eq,lb_meet_assoc. srun best use: lb_join_mono, lb_mask_refl, in_lb_mask_0, lb_meet_spec, lb_join_left unfold: lb_join, lb_meet.

exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "?l ↓ (?l0 ↓ ?l1)" in the current goal.
Found no subterm matching "a ↓ a" in the current goal.

original: unfold lb_meet, lb_join, lb_mask_equiv in *. intros. rewrite lb_meet_assoc. rewrite lb_meet_eq with (x:=a) (y:=(a ↑ b)) (x0:=a) (y0:=b). reflexivity.
